articles.title: Apple (AAPL) Files 8-K: Major Acquisition Announced
articles.summary: Apple Inc. has announced a significant acquisition in the AI space, filing an 8-K with the SEC. The deal is expected to accelerate product development.

articles.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Beats Q4 Earnings Expectations
articles.summary: Microsoft reported Q4 earnings that exceeded analyst expectations by 15%, driven by strong cloud growth and AI services.

articles.title: FDA Grants Breakthrough Designation for Novel Cancer Treatment
articles.summary: The FDA has granted breakthrough therapy designation to a new cancer immunotherapy, accelerating its path to approval.

articles.title: Tesla (TSLA) Announces New Manufacturing Partnership
articles.summary: Tesla has announced a strategic partnership with a major automotive supplier to expand production capacity.

articles.title: Merger: Tech Company Acquires Competitor for $2B
articles.summary: In a major industry consolidation move, a leading tech company has agreed to acquire a competitor for $2 billion.

articles.title: Amazon (AMZN) Launches New Cloud Service
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services announced a new cloud computing service targeting enterprise customers, with early adoption from major corporations.

articles.title: Google (GOOGL) Faces Antitrust Investigation
articles.summary: Regulatory authorities have launched a formal investigation into Google's business practices, citing concerns about market dominance.

articles.title: Nvidia (NVDA) Reports Record GPU Sales
articles.summary: Nvidia announced record sales of AI accelerator chips, with demand far exceeding supply as enterprises rush to build AI infrastructure.

articles.title: Meta (META) Announces Stock Buyback Program
articles.summary: Meta Platforms announced a $25 billion stock buyback program, signaling confidence in the company's long-term prospects.

articles.title: Intel (INTC) Misses Guidance, Stock Falls
articles.summary: Intel reported lower-than-expected guidance for the next quarter, citing weakness in PC market and delayed product launches.

articles.title: Biotech Company Enters Phase 3 Clinical Trial
articles.summary: A leading biotech company has advanced its experimental drug to Phase 3 clinical trials, a major milestone in drug development.

articles.title: Oracle (ORCL) Signs Major Cloud Contract
articles.summary: Oracle announced a multi-year cloud services contract with a Fortune 500 company, expanding its enterprise customer base.

articles.title: Semiconductor Shortage Eases, Prices Decline
articles.summary: Industry analysts report that the global semiconductor shortage is easing, with prices beginning to decline for the first time in months.

articles.title: PayPal (PYPL) Expands Cryptocurrency Services
articles.summary: PayPal announced expansion of its cryptocurrency offerings, allowing customers to buy, sell, and hold digital assets.

articles.title: Qualcomm (QCOM) Wins Major Smartphone Contract
articles.summary: Qualcomm secured a major contract to supply processors for next-generation smartphones from a leading manufacturer.

articles.title: Cybersecurity Firm Discovers Major Vulnerability
articles.summary: A critical security vulnerability has been discovered affecting millions of devices worldwide, prompting urgent patches.

articles.title: Adobe (ADBE) Acquires Design Software Startup
articles.summary: Adobe announced the acquisition of a promising design software startup to enhance its creative suite offerings.

articles.title: Salesforce (CRM) Expands AI Capabilities
articles.summary: Salesforce announced new AI-powered features for its CRM platform, aimed at improving customer relationship management.

articles.title: Zoom (ZM) Reports Strong User Growth
articles.summary: Zoom reported strong user growth and revenue expansion, driven by enterprise adoption and new product features.

articles.title: Slack (WORK) Announces New Integration Partners
articles.summary: Slack announced partnerships with major enterprise software providers to expand its integration ecosystem.
